scenes.action_text: COCO Original story by Lee Unkrich, Jason Katz, Matthew Aldrich & Adrian Molina Screenplay by Adrian Molina & Matthew Aldrich 1. EXT. MARIGOLD PATH - DUSK A path of marigold petals leads up to an altar lovingly arranged in a humble cemetery. An old woman lights a candle as the smoke of burning copal wood dances lyrically upward... CARD: DISNEY PRESENTS
